body.name: Wrangler Women's Blues Relaxed Fit Mid Rise Heavyweight Jean
body.description: Since 1947, Wrangler has maintained a relentless commitment to quality apparel built to fit your life. Wrangler fills your closet with classic snap shirts, tops and tees, jackets and denim that keep you comfortable in true western style. In and out of the saddle, the women’s western line is functional, fashionable and ready to hit the town whenever you are. This is Wrangler, made for you. Wrangler Blues Relaxed tapered jeans with more rooms in the seat and thighs for a more comfortable fit.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #177,865 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #1,112 in Women's Jeans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Jean actually fit and are made of real denim. Good quality and colour however the picture of these pants does not reflect how they fit. I love that these jeans are 100% cotton.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Awkward Fit
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this in a size 12 30. I'm about 140 pounds, 5'7" It fit very well in the waste. The length was fine but the legs were way too wide, massively huge. I wanted to like them because I love the color and the thickness of the material but I looked a little awkward in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally jeans for real women!
reviews.reviewText: Wow, these actually fit and are made of real denim!I do a lot of outside work, ride horses, fix fences, and get dirty outside. I wear jeans all the time so they have to look decent as well. I've gone through lots of brands of jeans. Whenever I find some that fit and wear well I just keep buying the same jean over and over. Nearly all jeans made now are stretch and last a season at most because the fabric is thin and can't stand up to actually doing anything in the jeans. Relaxed fit or loose fit has been replaced by skinny, meaning you can't actually do anything in them and they're uncomfortable. The last pair I bought are so stretchy that after a long day of wear I'm constantly pulling them up because they're so stretched out of shape. When I put them on they fit about right, but by the afternoon they look like clown pants. I don't want thin stretchy denim!I haven't found a decent pair of jeans in a couple of years and have been making do, then saw these. They aren't skinny or snug, they're loose enough that you can actually do things in them. Yet they are made out of real denim so they should wear.I admit I literally just took them out of the Amazon box and put them on and was so thrilled I had to write the review right away. I can't review the wear, but they fit well, and the denim is thick and sturdy as denim should be, but not too stiff that it's uncomfortable. The waist is where it should be, the pockets are roomy and sit where they should. I've just added a couple more pairs in my Amazon shopping cart so I'm pretty convinced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars These are awful
reviews.reviewText: I bought these because I was looking for 100% cotton jeans in a heavier weight. When I tried these Wranglers on, they fit reasonably well. A little tight in the waist and a bit short in the rise, but basically ok, since I don't like the legs of my jeans to look as if they were painted on. However, they have "grown" with every wearing, and are now huge in the seat and enormous in the thighs, at least 2 sizes larger than what would be expected from the fit of the waistband, which has only grown a bit. I'm going to try washing them in super-hot water, but I don't think even that will rescue the them. I could take them in, but it would be a ton of work for an inexpensive pair of jeans, because to make them look right, they need to have more fabric removed from the back than the front., which means I'd have to remove all the stitching from the hems and leg seams and recut each leg narrower before resewing and rehemming. Of course, the return window has already closed. BEWARE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These are not flimsy
reviews.reviewText: When they arrived I was happy to see they were 100% cotton. There is no elastic or polyester in the fabric. Which also means follow the sizing. When it says 29 inch waist - it is a 29 inch waist! I like them for walking the dog and doing chores around the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Jeans, Great Price
reviews.reviewText: Why is it so difficult to find good old fashion 100% Cotton jeans? I use to buy Lands End 100% cotton jeans, and didn't mind paying the $45- $50 a pair because they were well made and held up. But now, LE has gone cheap (in materials, not price) and flimsy and no longer carry the cotton jeans so I had to go in search of another brand. These were the only reasonably priced jeans that I could find that did not have spandex in them. I hate spandex! It gives the material a weird feel and they don't hold up as well as old fashion 100% cotton jeans. I wasn't sure what kind of quality I was going to get with these, so I decided to order them from Amazon because of the great return policy. I was very pleasantly surprised when I got them. They fit great and are really sturdy jeans. If I had to complain about something, it would be that these jeans only come in one color and that is dark blue. I wish they would make the lighter shades. The color on these jeans is so colorfast, that you can't even bleach them lighter. I tried and I don't think they ended up even 1 shade lighter. I can see that these are going to take quite a few washings before I can get them to look old. But this is good because that means that they will last for years.So bottom line is that if you are looking for great sturdy jeans, I would highly recommend that you give these a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars OK wow. Yep enormously wide
reviews.reviewText: I wanted relaxed wide legs because I wear a 14 - 16 with a pretty darn big tummy and flabby fat thighs. Well these seemed to fit at the waste nicely, ever with my big muffin top. The thighs were a bit loose but not too bad. But they are just as wide at the foot as they are at the thigh so they are really weird. By the end of the day however, they had stretched so much they were falling off and so baggy it was embarrassing. So I got these Lee Women's Relaxed Fit Straight Leg Jean and they fit great. They are the prefect not too skinny not too wide. If you are looking for "Mom" jeans, these fit great for an over wight 60 year old. Not baggy, not tight so you see the flab. I tiny bit of a flare at the foot. Good for shoes or boots. and nice sized pockets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally……well made heavy duty jeans!
reviews.reviewText: These jeans are made with the same heavy duty denim that jeans used to be made of. They are much superior to the majority of jeans made today!
Just like jeans used to be without lots of lycra!

Wow, mezcilla de calidad y sin nada de lycra. Yo estaba acostumbrada a subirme y cerrarme los jeans de distintas tallas jalando la lycra, con este debes pedir tu talla o no te cierra. Yo estoy feliz con jeans que no parecen leggings disfrazados. Lo uso los fines de semana, por su corte flojo no he encontrado la forma de llevarlos a la oficina los viernes, son cómodos y de buena calidad, aunque nada estilizados ni de moda.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 29, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: denim is fantastic but hips big and legs hugely wide which is a shame
reviews.reviewText: Great to have real denim jeans rather than awful ones with elastine but the legs are so wide I took them in three inches each leg and may take a but more. Also waist a but bug but hips go way out and I have an 11 inch difference but still to baggy on hips, will alter there as well when get chance. Wish they would do other styles for women in 100percent denim.

reviews.reviewTitle: Too small and too big at the same time
reviews.reviewText: The waist was too small and the legs were much too wide. I liked the material, too bad it didn't fit right.I used the size guide and it didn't really match up to the product.
Son de algodon, algo dificil de encontrar en mezclilla para mujer. Muy buen pantalon, se ve resistente y duradero.
